name: Third party ownership
text: §431:10A-109  Third party ownership.  The word, insured, as used in this part, shall not be construed as preventing a person other than the insured with a proper insurable interest from making application for and owning a policy covering the insured, or from being entitled under such a policy to any indemnities, benefits, and rights provided therein. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2]
